Class CalculatorListener

java.lang.Object
java.awt.event.MouseAdapter
CalculatorListener
All Implemented Interfaces:
KeyListener, MouseListener, MouseMotionListener, MouseWheelListener, EventListener
public class CalculatorListener extends MouseAdapter implements KeyListener
Listener to manage events from a CalculatorWindow.
Author:
Leonardo Ledda (LeddaZ)

    • CalculatorListener

      public CalculatorListener(JFrame f, JTextField p, boolean isNumber)
      Constructor.
      Parameters:
      f - JFrame associated with the listener (the CalculatorWindow)
      p - JTextField used as the calculator's display
      isNumber - true if the button contains a number, false otherwise
